text: Gadjah Mada University (; , abbreviated as UGM) is a research university and public university located in Yogyakarta, Indonesia. Gadjah Mada University was officially founded on 19 December 1949, and one of the oldest and largest educational institutions in the country. ==References== == Other websites == *Official website (English version) Category:1949 establishments in Asia Category:Colleges and universities in Indonesia Category:Special Region of Yogyakarta
title: Gadjah Mada University
